{"id":1097585934,"question_id":2887,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1699842827,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"62 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1097585934/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sort Vowels in a String","memory":"46.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String sortVowels(String s) {\n        // A41 a97 // a e i o u \n        \n        // l Ee tc O d e  //  EeOe =>  EOee\n        \n        List<Character> conList = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Character> vowList = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        Set<Character> set = new HashSet<>(Arrays.asList('a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U'));\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n            char ch = s.charAt(i);\n            if(set.contains(ch)){\n                vowList.add(ch);\n            }else{\n                conList.add(ch);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        Collections.sort(vowList);\n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        \n        int ci=0, vi=0;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n            char ch = s.charAt(i);\n            if(set.contains(ch)){\n                sb.append(vowList.get(vi++));\n            }else{\n                sb.append(conList.get(ci++));\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return sb.toString();\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sort-vowels-in-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
